short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension offers quick and hassle-free (1-click) copy/paste of localStorage/sessionStorage data across sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly and Easily copy/paste data from localStorage or sessionStorage between different websites.

Copy data from local-Storage/session-Storage of one website, and paste data to local-Storage/session-Storage of another website.

There is an easy-to-access clipboard to view the copied stuff. There are clear buttons as well.
